name: Superposition (Fox Chaotica)
description:
Inspired by the principle of Quantum Superposition, which states that, while unobserved, a single electron can occupy multiple different states and positions at the same time, and interact with itself. This puzzle stealth game allows the player to be in up to 4 places at any single time, and interact with various copies of themselves, but as soon as they're observed, they collapse into the location that was observed.

This game was my final year project for university. After much research, I determined that this concept hadn't been previously implemented in the way that I envisioned it. 

This game is more of a tech demo, showcasing the mechanic concept. I have intentions of taking this idea further. 

For more information on Superposition, please visit my website
